code:
%%{CloudNative_ServiceMesh}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-03.01 — Proposal Lifecycle (CloudNative_HelmChart)

[CloudNative_Serverless] --> DRAFT : ProposalCreated (CloudNative_Serverless)
note right of DRAFT
  Authoring & validation:
  • proposalId assigned
  • schema/policy checks
end note

DRAFT --> REVIEW : SubmittedForReview
note right of REVIEW
  Guard reviews (CloudNative_DockerImage)
  Can request changes or reject
end note

REVIEW --> DRAFT : ChangesRequested
REVIEW --> REJECTED : RejectedAtReview
REVIEW --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : ApprovedForVoting (CloudNative_K8sCluster)

OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> OPEN_FOR_VOTE : VoteCast (CloudNative_Serverless)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> TALLYING : VotingClosed

TALLYING --> DECIDED_APPROVED : VoteTallied → Approved (CloudNative_HelmChart)
TALLYING --> DECIDED_REJECTED : VoteTallied → Rejected (CloudNative_Serverless)

DECIDED_APPROVED --> EXECUTION : DecisionRecorded (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> ARCHIVED : DecisionRecorded (CloudNative_K8sCluster)

EXECUTION --> EXECUTED : PolicyChanged / GrantApproved / ProjectApproved (CloudNative_Serverless)
EXECUTION --> EXECUTION_FAILED : ExecutionFailed

EXECUTION_FAILED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (CloudNative_Serverless)
EXECUTION_FAILED --> RETRY_EXEC : RetryAuthorized
RETRY_EXEC --> EXECUTION : ReExecute

EXECUTED --> AUDIT : ExecutionCompleted
AUDIT --> ARCHIVED : AuditLogged (CloudNative_HelmChart)

%% Appeals (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (CloudNative_Serverless)
DECIDED_APPROVED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)
DECIDED_REJECTED --> APPEAL : AppealOpened (CloudNative_ServiceMesh)

APPEAL --> DECIDED_APPROVED : AppealResolved → uphold
APPEAL --> DECIDED_REJECTED : AppealResolved → overturn
APPEAL --> ARCHIVED : AppealWithdrawn

%% Cancellations
DRAFT --> CANCELLED : WithdrawnByAuthor
OPEN_FOR_VOTE --> CANCELLED : CancelledByAuthority
CANCELLED --> ARCHIVED : Archived

%% Terminal states
REJECTED --> [CloudNative_ServiceMesh]
ARCHIVED --> [CloudNative_DockerImage]

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class DRAFT,REVIEW,OPEN_FOR_VOTE,TALLYING,DECIDED_APPROVED,DECIDED_REJECTED,EXECUTION,EXECUTED,EXECUTION_FAILED,RETRY_EXEC,APPEAL,AUDIT,ARCHIVED,REJECTED,CANCELLED core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 用户在这里会遇到 CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_Serverless 的分支。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_HelmChart 和 CloudNative_Serverless'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster 这一块。
好的，我把它画成一个矩形框，名字叫 'CloudNative_DockerImage 和 CloudNative_K8sCluster'，对吧？
对的，就这样。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
我们需要加一个处理 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_HelmChart 的环节。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_HelmChart'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
接下来是关于 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 的逻辑。

嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]

收到。这是不是一个判断条件？我暂时写成 'CloudNative_K8sCluster 和 CloudNative_Serverless'。
嗯，这样看起来很清晰。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
这里必须包含 CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_HelmChart 这一块。
我把它加进去了，标签显示为 'CloudNative_Serverless 和 CloudNative_HelmChart'，你看看合适吗？
可以，继续吧。
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
然后，流程会走到 CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_Serverless。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'CloudNative_ServiceMesh 和 CloudNative_Serverless'？
对的，就这样。
